DANIEL ROTHSCHILD

I teach philosophy at University College London. Most of my work is about language and meaning. You can also find links to a website (in progress) on dynamic semantics and my cv.

This site contains my papers and drafts and information on conferences, workshops and such.


EVENTS

ESSLLI summer school course on dynamic semantics and pragmatics, Toulouse, 24-28 July 2017

Context and Variables, All Souls College, Oxford, 13 May 2017

DynSem, Berlin, May 2016
